about_the_game:
Disquiet is a multiplayer co-op game where you and your friends became ghost hunters.
The main goal of each mission is to identify and potentially exterminate the ghost using hunting equipment that is upgradable with experience points.
You earn experience points by successfully completing the mission objective, there are also 4 additional quests that you can do.


The game itself has already 4 maps, and some basic equipment.
It has also few different ghost types (which mean each game you play they differ from the last game) that are unique in their own way, you can identify them by using the given equipment (some ghost types may spawn usable items in the house) and analyzing their behavior.

In conclusion:

  • 4 different maps
  • 8 unique ghost types
  • many items

We are planning to add more content as soon as possible.


If you want to contribute to the game join our discord server and let us know about features!

Disquiet is a multiplayer co-op game where you and your friends became ghost hunters.
The main goal of each mission is to identify and potentially exterminate the ghost using hunting equipment that is upgradable with experience points.
You earn experience points by successfully completing the mission objective, there are also 4 additional quests that you can do.


The game itself has already 4 maps, and some basic equipment.
It has also few different ghost types (which mean each game you play they differ from the last game) that are unique in their own way, you can identify them by using the given equipment (some ghost types may spawn usable items in the house) and analyzing their behavior.

In conclusion:

  • 4 different maps
  • 8 unique ghost types
  • many items

We are planning to add more content as soon as possible.


If you want to contribute to the game join our discord server and let us know about features!
name: Disquiet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 (4th Generation) / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 new gen / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Disquiet is a multiplayer co-op game (up to 4 players) where you and your friends became ghost hunters.The main goal of each mission is to identify and potentially exterminate the ghost using hunting equipment that is upgradable with experience points.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Polish
*languages with full audio support
